name: Chia Almond Pudding
description: This Chia Almond Pudding is a perfect choice for anyone looking to enjoy a low-sodium, high-fiber meal that doesn't compromise on taste. Part of our Healthy Recipes collection, it's meticulously designed to cater to those who are on a quest for healthified meal options. Delicious and nutritious, it's a delightful way to start your day or enjoy as a light snack.

recipeInstructions.text: Measure 0.50 cup (240ml) of Almond Milk - Original.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Wash and dice half a medium apple.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse 15 grams of grapes under cold water and pat dry.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, combine chia seeds with almond milk. Stir well and let it sit for 5 minutes to allow the chia seeds to start absorbing the liquid.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Add the diced apples, grapes, and almonds to the chia mixture. Stir until all ingredients are well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Cover the bowl with a lid or plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight to let the pudding set.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8
